description: Try our easy to follow Sri Lankan Fish Ball Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sri Lankan Fish Ball Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g firm white skinless fish fillets
Roti and steamed basmati rice to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch choy sum for 1 minute. Drain. Top rice with fish curry, choy sum and chilli, and serve with roti.
